creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: large cliff at R with figure climbing trail, heading towards small pavilion at top of cliff; other tall bluffs in background; waterfall in background URC; trees and water at bottom
markings: pen mark on top: [Ryotai]; Japanese writing on top; two intaglio seals L edge LLQ; larger intaglio seal LLC; large oval relief seal R side top
title: Landscape with Jutting Cliff
